The policy pricing.
API Version: 2021-07-01.

{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}


### Create or update a policy pricing


{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var policyPricing = new AzureNative.Authorization.PolicyPricing("policyPricing", new AzureNative.Authorization.PolicyPricingArgs
        {
            PolicyPricingName = "Advanced",
            PricingTier = "Advanced",
            Scope = "providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/HardwareDivision",
        });
    }

}

```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}


```go
package main

import (
	authorization "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native/sdk/go/azure/authorization"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := authorization.NewPolicyPricing(ctx, "policyPricing", &authorization.PolicyPricingArgs{
			PolicyPricingName: pulumi.String("Advanced"),
			PricingTier:       pulumi.String("Advanced"),
			Scope:             pulumi.String("providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/HardwareDivision"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}


```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_azure_native as azure_native

policy_pricing = azure_native.authorization.PolicyPricing("policyPricing",
    policy_pricing_name="Advanced",
    pricing_tier="Advanced",
    scope="providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/HardwareDivision")

```

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as azure_native from "@pulumi/azure-native";

const policyPricing = new azure_native.authorization.PolicyPricing("policyPricing", {
```

    <dd>{{% md %}}Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="type_python">
<a href="#type_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of the resource (Microsoft.Authorization/policyPricings).{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}







## Supporting Types



<h4 id="pricingtier">Pricing<wbr>Tier</h4>

{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="tabular"><dt>Advanced</dt>
    <dd>Advanced{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt>Defender</dt>
    <dd>Defender{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature. This pricing tier is managed by Azure Security Center.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language go %}}
<dl class="tabular"><dt>Pricing<wbr>Tier<wbr>Advanced</dt>
    <dd>Advanced{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt>Pricing<wbr>Tier<wbr>Defender</dt>
    <dd>Defender{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature. This pricing tier is managed by Azure Security Center.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
<dl class="tabular"><dt>Advanced</dt>
    <dd>Advanced{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt>Defender</dt>
    <dd>Defender{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature. This pricing tier is managed by Azure Security Center.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language python %}}
<dl class="tabular"><dt>ADVANCED</dt>
    <dd>Advanced{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt>DEFENDER</dt>
    <dd>Defender{{% md %}}The pricing tier gives the user ability to use policy exemption feature. This pricing tier is managed by Azure Security Center.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

## Import


An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:authorization:PolicyPricing Advanced /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/HardwareDivision/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/policyPricings/Advanced 
```
